thepeopleofsingapore:

(Trigger warning: violence)

I hope if I tell my story then more people like me will see that they are not alone. You can go through hard things but still survive.

When I was 19, my girlfriend died. Itâs a long story. She was killed - beaten to death by a gang of guys. She was the only one who cared for me back then. She had taken me in since I was 16 when I was forced to leave home.
